name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【福岡サンパレス】 [ysmbvtf3_bc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: A montage showcasing fan messages for Hoshimachi Suisei's 'Spectra of Nova' live tour.
Informational slide displaying concert rules and attention points for attendees.
A rapid sequence showcasing various tour merchandise items, including the Essentials Pack and individual goods.
Continuation of the fan message showcase and countdown montage for the live tour.
